properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Crockett, TN; Dyer, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 5 at 10:12AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Mississippi
River...S.F. of the Forked Deer River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the S.F. of the Forked Deer River near Halls
* until further notice.
* At 09 AM Sunday the stage was 10.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 11.0 feet on Monday January 06.
* Flood stage is 9.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Thursday January 02 and will
continue rising to near 11.0 feet by  Monday January 06 then begin
falling.
* At 11.5 feet...Farm land near the river is flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
